title: Image Reveal
description: An image reveal component where the image appears and follows the cursor when hovering over any div

body.raw:
<Tabs defaultValue="preview" className="w-full relative">
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTrigger value="preview">Preview</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="codesnippet">Code</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>
  <TabsContent value="preview">
    <ComponentPreview
      basicPadding={true}
      name="imageReveal"
      category="footer"
    />
  </TabsContent>
  <TabsContent value="codesnippet">
    <CodeWrapper noExpand={true}>
      <CodePreview name="imageReveal" category="footer" />
    </CodeWrapper>
  </TabsContent>
</Tabs>

### MouseMove

```tsx
const handleImageHover = useCallback(
  (image: ImageData) => {
    if (activeImage !== image) {
      setActiveImage(image)
      // setOpacity(0);
      // setScale(0.5);
      if (timeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current)
      timeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
        setOpacity(1)
        setScale(1)
      }, 50)
    } else {
      setOpacity(1)
      setScale(1)
    }
  },
  [activeImage]
)
```

### MouseLeave

```tsx
const handleMouseLeave = useCallback(() => {
  setOpacity(0)
  setScale(0.5)
  if (timeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current)
  timeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
    setActiveImage(null)
  }, 300)
}, [])
```
